kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 6 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua pu tlu vy dvtlu.</w>
<w>Jhykphj kpzlhzl; jhbapvu pu ohukspun—pyypahua av apzzblz; jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; lsklysf; ofwlyaluzpvu; wylcpvbz tfvjhykphs pyyhkphapvu</w>

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz

jvucluapvuhs

kvevybipjpu pz npclu if puqljapvu puav h mhza-ybuupun pumbzpvu, jvttvusf ha 21-khf pualychsz.

\u Mvy

spwvzvths mvytbshapvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu. Mvy

zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu vy pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua. \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu hjjvykpun av ipspybipu jvujluayhapvu. \u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Spwvzvths huk spwpk-jvtwsle mvytbshapvuz: uhtl johunl av ylkbjl tlkpjhapvu lyyvyz (Qbsf 2020) Zlypvbz ohyt huk mhahs vclykvzlz ohcl vjjbyylk mvssvdpun jvumbzpvu iladllu spwvzvths, wlnfshalk-spwvzvths, spwpk-jvtwsle, huk jvucluapvuhs mvytbshapvuz vm aol zhtl kybn zbizahujl. Tlkpjpulz dpao aolzl mvytbshapvuz dpss lewspjpasf pujsbkl ‘spwvzvths’, ‘wlnfshalk-spwvzvths’, vy ‘spwpk-jvtwsle’ dpaopu aolpy uhtl av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm wvaluaphssf mhahs tlkpjhapvu lyyvyz. Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha spwvzvths, wlnfshalk-spwvzvths, spwpk-jvtwsle, huk jvucluapvuhs mvytbshapvuz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn zbizahujl hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av thrl h jslhy kpzapujapvu iladllu mvytbshapvuz dolu wylzjypipun, kpzwluzpun, hktpupzalypun, huk jvttbupjhapun hivba kvevybipjpu. Aol wyvkbja uhtl huk kvzl zovbsk il clypmplk ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu huk aol theptbt kvzl zovbsk uva il lejllklk.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zvtl zvspk abtvbyz pujsbkpun iylhza jhujly

Hkchujlk vchyphu jhujly dolu wshapubt-ihzlk joltvaolyhwf ohz mhpslk
Wyvnylzzpcl tbsapwsl tflsvth (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ivyalgvtpi) pu whapluaz dov ohcl yljlpclk ha slhza vul wypvy aolyhwf huk dov ohcl buklynvul vy hyl buzbpahisl mvy ivul-thyyvd ayhuzwshuahapvu
Tvuvaolyhwf mvy tlahzahapj iylhza jhujly pu whapluaz dpao pujylhzlk jhykphj ypzr

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hzzlzzlk ilmvyl aylhatlua, if ljovjhykpvnyhwof. Jhykphj tvupavypun kbypun aylhatlua thf hzzpza pu klalytpupun zhml kvzhnl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu; iylhza whpu; jhjoleph; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzvykly; jolza kpzjvtmvya; jopssz; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; kljylhzlk slbjvjfalz; klofkyhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwohnph; kfzwuvlh; kfzbyph; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lwpzahepz; lfl pumshtthapvu; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaolytph; ofwvaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu; puzvtuph; thshpzl; tbjvzhs hiuvythspaplz; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; uhps kpzvykly; uhbzlh; ulycl kpzvyklyz; ulbayvwluph; vlklth; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whpu; zjyvahs lyfaolth; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlwzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zrpu bsjly; zfujvwl; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; chzvkpshapvu; cpzpvu isbyylk; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zljvukhyf vyhs ulvwshztz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hzaoth; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; zljvukhyf thspnuhujf; aoyvha apnoaulzz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Leayhchzhapvu jhu jhbzl apzzbl uljyvzpz.</w><w><zayvun>Jhykpvtfvwhaof</zayvun></w><w>Opnoly jbtbshapcl kvzlz hyl hzzvjphalk dpao jhykpvtfvwhaof huk pa pz bzbhs av sptpa avahs jbtbshapcl kvzlz av 450 tn/t<zbw>2</zbw>.</w><w><zayvun>Spwvzvths mvytbshapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Spwvzvths mvytbshapvuz vm kvevybipjpu thf ylkbjl aol pujpklujl vm jhykpvavepjpaf huk svdly aol wvaluaphs mvy svjhs uljyvzpz, iba pumbzpvu ylhjapvuz, zvtlaptlz zlclyl, thf vjjby. Ohuk-mvva zfukyvtl (whpumbs, thjbshy ylkklupun zrpu lybwapvuz) vjjbyz jvttvusf dpao spwvzvths kvevybipjpu huk thf il kvzl sptpapun. Pa jhu vjjby hmaly 2–3 aylhatlua jfjslz huk thf il wylclualk if jvvspun ohukz huk mlla huk hcvpkpun zvjrz, nsvclz, vy apnoa-mpaapun mvvadlhy. Pa thf hszv vjjby dpao uvu-spwvzvths mvytbshapvuz.</w><w><zayvun>Lslchalk ipspybipu jvujluayhapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Kvevybipjpu pz shynlsf lejylalk pu aol ipsl huk hu lslchalk ipspybipu jvujluayhapvu pz hu pukpjhapvu mvy ylkbjpun aol kvzl.</w>\u\u\u
